definition: variant of 人[ren2]/"person" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 10), occurring in 兒, 兀, 兄 etc
erhua variant of 幹活|干活[gan4 huo2]
erhua variant of 做活[zuo4 huo2]
erhua variant of 苦活[ku3 huo2]
erhua variant of 重活[zhong4 huo2]
needlework/working for a living as a needleworker

sentences.english: They all stopped working and were talking excitedly.
sentences.chinese: 他们都停下手中的活儿，激动地交谈起来。

sentences.english: Sally's party piece is singing whilst standing on her hands.
sentences.chinese: 萨利的派对绝活儿是倒立唱歌。

sentences.english: Then he would stand up and clapped his hands and said that he would stop playing to continue his work.
sentences.chinese: 然后爬起来，拍拍手说，不玩了，又继续干活儿去了。

sentences.english: If he should come here, he would help us with our work.
sentences.chinese: 如果他真能来这儿的话，他会帮助我们干活儿的。

sentences.english: Before delivering the job, run the spelling and grammar checker once more, just for safety's sake.
sentences.chinese: 在交活儿以前，仅为保险起见，须再运行一次拼写。

sentences.english: We came to work, because it's better than Henan , he says.
sentences.chinese: 我们是来这儿找活儿干的，因为这里比河南好，他说。

sentences.english: He touched them on the head and went on working.
sentences.chinese: 然后他摸摸他们的头，嘿嘿笑着继续干活儿。

sentences.english: They are adept at many special skills.
sentences.chinese: 他们有很多拿手的绝活儿。

sentences.english: The children are busy as bees , helping their mother in the garden .
sentences.chinese: 孩子们忙个不停地在花园里帮母亲干活儿。

sentences.english: It's a very finicky job to get all these little bones out of the fish.
sentences.chinese: 把这些小鱼刺从鱼里全部挑出来是个细致活儿。

sentences.english: “They really wanted to work it out with me,” she says.
sentences.chinese: “他们真的想和我一起出去干活儿，”她说。

sentences.english: I work here by day and I am paid by the day.
sentences.chinese: 我白天在这儿干活儿，按日计酬。

sentences.english: On day Cui Ning went out to work in Xiantan.
sentences.chinese: 一天，崔宁到湘潭市区做活儿。

sentences.english: You should roll the wool into a ball before you start knitting.
sentences.chinese: 你应当在织毛活儿以前先把毛线绕成线球。

definition: erhua variant of 幹活|干活[gan4 huo2]
erhua variant of 苦活[ku3 huo2]
erhua variant of 重活[zhong4 huo2]
tree trunk/main part of sth/to manage/to work/to do/capable/cadre/to kill (slang)/to fuck (vulgar)
erhua variant of 做活[zuo4 huo2]
